attributes.action: Ban the use of bee killing pesticides
attributes.additional_details: We know the bee population is in dangerous decline. In order to preserve these important insects, pesticides that harm them should be prohibited for use in the UK.
attributes.background: Prohibit use of pesticides dangerous to bees.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Continue the ban on the use of Neonicotinoids
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563943

Overturn the decision to allow the use of neonicotinoid pesticides
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569214
